CVE.summary: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in pages/addcomment2.php in Neuron Blog 1.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) commentname, (2) commentmail, (3) commentwebsite, and (4) comment parameters.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
